text: I think that its still early on for this type of programming paradigm, so I think more of the focus is on ironing out the conceptual framework and semantics of the paragdigm rather than determining if it “scales”. The premise of a truly additive approach to decomposing a software system into raw requirements is quite intruiging, even though, similar to you, Im not entirely bullish on it yet.
